alert.note: Alert for San Luis Valley Including Alamosa, Del Norte, Fort Garland, Saguache (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 19 at 3:25PM MDT until May 20 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning remains in effect until 9 PM today for gusty winds and low relative humidity values for fire weather zones 220 through 237, which includes all of south central and southeast Colorado... ...A Red Flag Warning has been issued from Noon until 7 pm on Friday for fire weather zone 224, which includes the San Luis Valley... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 224... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 7 PM MDT FRIDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 224... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag Warning for high winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from noon to 7 PM MDT Friday. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 224. * Winds...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 9 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: San Luis Valley Including Alamosa, Del Norte, Fort Garland, Saguache
